{"id":718538231,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1654827792,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/718538231/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int has[130];\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int len = s.length(), cnt = 0, ans = 0, tot = 1;\n        memset(has, 0, sizeof(has));\n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            if(has[s[i]-'a'] != tot){\n                has[s[i] - 'a'] = tot;\n                cnt++;\n            }\n            else{\n                cnt = 1;\n                tot++;\n                has[s[i] - 'a'] = tot;\n            }\n            ans = max(ans, cnt);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
